title: IInstanceToVaryOptions.SetD2IncrementDimensions
description: Sets the dimensions to increment in Direction 2.
signature:

   System.Object

,
   System.Object

)

parameters.name: IncrementDimValues

returns: True if the dimensions are incremented successfully, false if not
